thread.title: SME success: Fixation gets capital moving
thread.title_full: SME success: Fixation gets the capital moving - Telegraph

author: The Telegraph
title: SME success: Fixation gets capital moving
text: Discover more small business advice » Alex Bodini launched Fixation London in January this year to appeal to stylish Londoners who like to cycle, with the intent to get more people on bikes through offering fashionable frames. The six bikes in the range, each designed by Alex alongside a team of experts, are single-speed and fixed-gear. In May, the company opened its doors to its first shop, located in Covent Garden, London. It is now looking to enter the wholesale market and release gift products. In the company’s short lifespan, it has amassed a big social media following – particularly on Instagram. The company is run solely by Bodini with the help of one part-time worker. • Win a state-of-the-art Canon printer for your SME »
